subs.text: This is a perfect analog for the software we develop. We strive to make it simple, but under the covers the simpler it is the harder it is to master. After a while you can't add more functionality without breaking it every time you make a change. So the challenge to make more powerful software is to invent ways to simplify what's going on behind the user interface.
Simple user interface, complexity behind the scenes.
Note: This illustration came from a tweet by Sharad Bishnoi.
